Package com.xm.cryptorecservice.persistence

package com.xm.cryptorecservice.persistence
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.xm.cryptorecservice

  • Class
    Description
    CryptoPriceAggregateStatsMiner
    A Runnable that queries the DatabaseConnection object with which it is constructed for aggregate stats of the provided crypto.
    CryptoPricePersister
    A Runnable which: Uses the DatabaseConnection object provided at construction to create the table corresponding to the File parameter object's name. Uses the provided CryptoPriceFileReader to read the file in memory. Uses the DatabaseConnection object to persist the file rows on the DB table just created. Once finished, it counts down the provided CountDownLatch instance.
    CryptoPricesForDateMiner
    Queries the DatabaseConnection object provided at construction for the prices of the provided cryptocurrency for the provided day, and stores the normalized price in the provided ConcurrentMap instance.
    DatabaseConnection
    An interface for communicating with a relational database.
    DatabaseConnectionImpl
    An implementation of DatabaseConnection that performs batch inserts for DatabaseConnection.insertAllCryptoPrices(String, List).
    InMemoryAggregateStats
    An in-memory " database " of crypto stats with thread-safe structural modification operations.
    UserRepository
    A JpaRepository used to persist UserEntity instances.
